ch.nolix.system.neuron

Class Neuron<IO>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.system.neuronoid.Neuronoid<Neuron<IO>,IO,IO>
      • ch.nolix.system.neuron.Neuron<IO>
  • Type Parameters:
    IO - The type of the input and output of a neuron.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFluentObject<Neuron<IO>>

    public final class Neuron<IO>
extends Neuronoid<Neuron<IO>,IO,IO>
    A neuron has an output function that can be set programmatically.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
